titlestmt.titleproper: Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009
A Guide to the Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009 FA452

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-05-18 00:12:25 -0400.

did.unittitle: Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Rockefeller family photographic holdings are arranged into the following series:
Rockefeller family and Avery family photographs, Series 1001. William Avery Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1002. John D. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1003. William Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1004. John D. Rockefeller Jr. family photographs, Series 1005. Pocantico Hills photographs, Series 1006. John D. Rockefeller 3rd family photographs, Series 1007. Nelson A. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1008. Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009. David Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1010.
The Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009, is futher arranged in subseries by format - Prints and Oversized.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: For other Rockefeller family photographic holdings, please see the following finding aids:

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A small series of Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs including portraits of Laurance S. Rockefeller as well as documention of a selection of his conservation and philanthropic activities including the Ramon Magsaysay Award Foundation, the Outdoor Recreation Resources Review Commission (ORRRC) and the Palasaides Interstate Park Commission.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: For ease of access, the material is further arranged by:
Prints (Boxes P 1, P 2, P 3, etc.). Oversized (Boxes: O 1, O 2, O 3, C 1, C 2, C 3, etc.).

did.unittitle: LSR - Conservation - Outdoor Recreation Resource Review Commission (ORRRC)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: White House Meeting. President John F. Kennedy and Senator Henry Jackson are pictured in several images.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center (MSKCC) and Palisades Interstate Park Commission

did.unittitle: LSR - Philanthropies - Ramon Magsaysay Award Foundation

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Material has been boxed; otherwise remains as received.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.
